objects.description: [AndroidOverlayMalware](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0012) involved "three campaigns in Europe" that "used view overlay techniques...to present nearly identical credential input UIs as seen in benign apps, subsequently tricking unwary users into providing their banking credentials."

external_references.description: Wu Zhou et al. (2016, June 28). THE LATEST ANDROID OVERLAY MALWARE SPREADING VIA SMS PHISHING IN EUROPE. Retrieved December 21, 2016.
